item.title: 5,000,000 users on Foursquare now focus on activity & retention
item.description: Foursquare this week should break through the 5 million users mark and it has taken about 8 weeks to add an extra million.

item.title: Gowalla? Foursquare open for Business? Who will setup a business team in Europe First
item.description: Foursquare is now open to business and is moving beyond geo-tagging and location based social networking.
